2.title: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures
2.description: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures is an adventure in which you can get mesmerized by accomplishing the missions you are given as a member of the spatial organization.

3.title: Viking Fjord
3.description: Enter into the Vikings atmosphere as a real explorer. Our players have been traveling back in time to experience Fjord´s life.

4.title: Dethrone
4.description: Dethrone is a fantasy RPG adventure game where the player’s mission is to restore order in the region by completing missions given by the mysterious sovereign.

5.title: Mushroom Mania
5.description: Mushroom Mania is a collect-a-thon platformer set in an oversized fantasy mushroom world.

6.title: Tombs of Treasures
6.description: Tombs of Treasures is an action adventure/platformer walking simulator. In the game, the adventurer Liu Fogel arrives in the jungle to look for treasures.

7.title: Sweet village
7.description: This is Rex. Many legends were told by ancient yummy bears but nobody could say how Rex ended up in this candy world. Who knows, maybe he ate too much candy and ended up here.

8.title: 3D print your life
8.description: Have you ever tried a 3D printer? Based on the CNC concept (Computer Numerical Control) a 3D printer helps you to build solid objects. 3D printing has been around for several years but only in more recent years has it become more accessible to the general public.

about.title: About the Alpha
about.text1: Who can access the Alpha Season v1?
about.description1: Anyone with an Alpha Pass can access all of the Alpha content (Alpha HUB + 17 experiences) and earn up to 1,000 SAND + 3 NFT rewards. Players without an Alpha Pass will be able to join the limited content Alpha (Alpha HUB + 3 experiences) and participate in daily social contests to try to win an Alpha Pass.
about.text2: How long does the Alpha last?
about.description2: The Alpha starts on November 29 and ends on December 20, 2021.

howToJoin.title: Joining the Alpha
howToJoin.text1: How can I get an Alpha Pass?

bulletPoints.description1: We are rewarding early supporters by opening a special Raffle for LAND owners. LAND owners can register for the raffle and get a chance to win an Alpha Pass. Registration will open shortly before the Alpha starts. The more LANDS you own, the more chances you get to win an Alpha Pass. One LAND = 1 raffle chance.
bulletPoints.description2: by participating in Daily Contests in the Alpha Hub, all players can get a chance to win an Alpha Pass. Daily contests will happen every weekday. Keep an eye on The Sandbox Twitter and Discord to know when they will occur.
bulletPoints.description3: if you didn’t win an Alpha Pass, you can also purchase one on OpenSea as some LAND owners might want to sell theirs. Keep your eyes open!
bulletPoints.warning: Warning: after the Alpha is closed, on December 20, Alpha Passes purchased on OpenSea will no longer allow you to claim rewards. After this date, we strongly advise you not to purchase one on OpenSea.

howToJoin.text2: How do I register for the raffle?
howToJoin.description2: The raffle will open a few days before the Alpha starts. Keep an eye on The Sandbox news to find out when this will happen. Once the raffle opens, go to
howToJoin.text3: How many chances of winning an Alpha Pass do I have if I only have 1 LAND?
howToJoin.description4: You get 1 Raffle Ticket by registering (if you own at least one LAND) and 1 more ticket for each LAND that you own. For instance, if you own 20 LANDS, you’ll have 21 chances of winning an Alpha Pass.
howToJoin.text4: Can I win more than 1 Alpha Pass in the Raffle if I own several LANDS?
howToJoin.description5: No, you can only win one Alpha Pass per person. It is important to highlight the difference between a “Raffle Ticket” and an “Alpha Pass”. A “Raffle Ticket” is an entry for the Raffle. The more LANDS you own, the more entries (tickets) you get, and the more chances you have to win. Someone who owns several LANDS will have several Raffle Tickets and therefore more chances to win. But each person can only earn one “Alpha Pass”.

playing.title: Playing the Alpha
playing.text1: What do I need to play the Alpha?
playing.description1: - You need to play on Windows (other computer OS and mobile versions will come in the future).
playing.description2: - You also need a permanent internet connection.
playing.description3: - To claim your Alpha Pass and rewards, you’ll need a little ETH to pay the gas fees.

requirements.title: The Sandbox Alpha Game Client Minimum Specs
requirements.3: i5-8400 or newer (AVX support is required)

playing.text2: How do I play the Alpha?
playing.description4: You will need to download the latest version of the Game Client that will be released alongside the Alpha. Everyone will be able to play in the Alpha Hub and the 3 additional experiences, but only Alpha Pass holders will be able to play all 18 experiences and claim the rewards at the end of the Alpha.
playing.hrefText1: Click here to download the Game Client.
playing.text3: Can I play the Alpha on the Game Maker?
playing.description5: No, you will need to play on the Game Client. You will be able to download the Game Client at
playing.text4: I don’t have an Alpha Pass; can I still access some of the experiences?
playing.description7: Yes, you can access the Alpha HUB and 3 more experiences: The “NFT Institute” art gallery, the “Club XYZ” dance club, and The “Dungeon of Dum-Yz” adventure.
playing.text5: How many people can get in one Experience at the same time?
playing.description8: Up to 40 players can be in one experience at the same time. When more than 40 players try to enter the same experience, a new instance of that experience is created. This means that when you are in a multiplayer experience you will only see up to 39 other players, but there could be more players in other instances.
playing.text6: How do I know when an Experience will be revealed?
playing.description9: If you click on the Experience thumbnails on the Alpha Map, you’ll see the date and time it will be revealed. In the top right corner of the Alpha Map, you will also find a calendar showing when new Experiences will be released in the future.
playing.text7: Can I play with a friend?
playing.description10: An Experience can have up to 40 players at a time; if there are more players, new instances are created to host the additional players. If you join an Experience at the same time as your friend, you have a high chance of ending up in the same instance. But if you don’t end up in the same instance as your friend, you can join them by following these steps:
playing.description11: - To find your instance ID after you enter the game, type
playing.description14: - To jump to your friend’s instance, type
playing.description21: in the in-game chat to see the chat commands.
playing.text8: Can I keep playing the Alpha after the Alpha ends?
playing.description22: No, once the Alpha closes all experiences will be unavailable until further notice.
playing.text9: Can players play the games I make?
playing.description23: Yes, players can use the Game Maker Gallery to play the games you created. However, you can’t publish your game into your LAND yet. We are working to enable publishing in your LAND in the near future.

rewards.title: Alpha Rewards
rewards.text1: What can I do with the Rewards?
rewards.description1: - The SAND that you earn is a cryptocurrency that can be used to purchase NFTs (LANDS, Avatars, and Marketplace assets) in The Sandbox Marketplace. It can also be traded on crypto trading platforms.
rewards.description2: - The Alpha NFT rewards are Entities that can be used in the Game Maker to create your own experiences. Not only will your creations visually stand out from the others thanks to the fact that it will host exclusive Alpha NFTs, but they will also be more challenging as the Alpha rewards are very powerful Entities.
rewards.text2: What are the Rewards of Alpha?
rewards.description3: If you own an Alpha Pass, you will be able to earn up to 1,000 SAND and 3 NFTs.
rewards.description4: SAND is a cryptocurrency. And NFT rewards are NFTs that you can keep or trade on OpenSea, like any other NFTs.
rewards.text4: Is there a way to earn rewards if I don't have the Alpha Pass?
rewards.description5: No, only Alpha Pass holders will be able to earn Alpha Rewards — but anybody can earn an Alpha Pass during Daily Contests in the Alpha HUB.
rewards.text5: Do I get the 1,000 $SAND reward just for playing the Alpha?
rewards.description6: To earn the 1,000 $SAND reward you will need to play-to-earn by completing all 5 levels of the Alpha Pass by completing Alpha Quests in the game. Alpha Quests are very simple quests that only require you to explore the Alpha experiences. Check the Reward Tab section to learn more about the Alpha Quests and the rewards.
rewards.text6: If I gift/sell my Alpha Pass, can I still get the rewards for the levels I completed?
rewards.description7: NO! Please be very careful! YOU MUST have your Alpha Pass in your wallet on the last day of the Alpha on December 20 to be able to claim your rewards. Two people cannot share an Alpha Pass to get the rewards twice.
rewards.description8: All users who have an Alpha Pass in their wallet when the Alpha ends (December 20, 00h00 UST) will be marked as eligible to claim rewards — once you are marked you can claim rewards whenever you want, now or in the future, even if you lose your Alpha Pass.
rewards.description9: On the contrary, all users who do not have an Alpha Pass in their wallet when the Alpha ends (December 20, 00h00 UST) will be marked as NON-eligible to claim rewards, forever, even if the user gets an Alpha Pass after that date.
rewards.description10: This system is designed to prevent fraud.
rewards.text7: When can I claim the rewards? Can I claim rewards as I progress through each level?
rewards.description11: You will be able to claim the rewards that you have unlocked by leveling-up only AFTER the Alpha has ended (Dec. 20). After that date you will have all the time you need to claim your rewards, but you will not be able to level-up anymore.
rewards.text8: Alpha passes can be traded. What happens if I make it to Level 2 and then trade my pass?
rewards.description12: Progression is not linked to the Alpha Pass; it’s linked to the account — the Alpha Pass is just a key to allow the account progression to go up.
rewards.description13: If you reach level 2, for example, and then give your Pass to a friend, they will start at level 1. Then if your friend reaches level 3 and gives you back your pass, you will be back at level 2 where you left off. Then if you return the Pass to your friend, they will be at level 3 where they left off.
rewards.description14: But remember! Only one person will be able to claim the rewards since only one person will have the Pass in their wallet when the Alpha ends! You can trade your pass with a friend to allow them to explore the game and have fun, but you need to get it back for the rewards!!
rewards.text9: What happens if an Alpha Pass holder trades their Alpha Pass after completion?
rewards.description15: Alpha Pass holders need to hold onto their Alpha Pass until the last day of the Alpha to claim rewards. What matters is the date (last day of the Alpha on December 20), not the progression on the Pass. The Alpha Pass holder must keep it until the last day, even if they completed all objectives prior to that date. Once the Alpha is over, an Alpha Pass has no value other than as memorabilia and can no longer be used to earn progression or rewards.
rewards.description16: Do not purchase an Alpha Pass once the Alpha is over (after December 20) if you hope to get progression and rewards. Only buy one after December 20 if you want it as a souvenir that has no other purpose.

level.title: Progression
level.text1: How do I progress in the Alpha? How can I reach level 5?
level.description1: You need to complete Alpha Quests to progress in the Alpha. Enter any experience other than the Alpha Hub and locate the Metaverse Guide. Talk to him to get an Alpha Quest. You can easily spot him thanks to the blue exclamation mark above his head.
level.description2: To complete level 5, you will need to complete enough Alpha Quests in the game. But don’t worry — they are very easy and only require you to explore locations in the experience.
level.text2: Do I need to perform a daily action repeatedly?
level.description3: There are no requirements for daily activity. If you want to, you can complete all objectives in one sitting.

presscoverage.title: Press Coverage
presscoverage.text1: How does the press access the Alpha?
presscoverage.description1: Press and influencers will be allowed to join by having their Sandbox account whitelisted to bypass the need to own an Alpha Pass and access all experiences. However, entering the game that way does not make the account eligible for rewards — only Alpha Pass holders will be eligible for rewards.
presscoverage.text2: How can I request access to the Alpha for press coverage?
presscoverage.description2: To request your Influencer Pass, please contact us at: contact@sandbox.game. Please make sure to include your communication channels and an overview of your audience, outreach, and objectives to access to the Alpha.

security.title: Security
security.text1: How can I keep my wallet safe?
security.description1: There are a lot of bad actors waiting for an opportunity to get your tokens and NFTs. You need to be really careful! We suggest that you always keep in mind the following recommendations:

bulletPoints.0: Never share your seed phrase with anyone
bulletPoints.1: Don’t keep your seed phrase unprotected
bulletPoints.2: Create strong passwords for your wallet & any accounts associated with it
bulletPoints.3: Use a password manager with a very strong master password
bulletPoints.4: Do not, under any circumstances, leave your wallet unlocked in the browser
bulletPoints.5: Encrypt your PC drive and use strong passwords for it and your user account
bulletPoints.6: Avoid using public Wi-Fi, and if it cannot be helped, use a VPN to protect yourself
bulletPoints.7: Do not click links from any unknown email, Discord, chat, or other source

security.description5: - Basic Safety and Security Tips for Metamask
security.description6: - To be your Own Bank with MetaMask, you need to master these best practices
security.text2: Will The Sandbox ever request my secret passphrase?
security.description7: NO, The Sandbox will never request your secret passphrase and you should not share your secret passphrase with anyone! Sharing your secret passphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.
security.text3: How can I report suspicious activity?
security.description8: If you detect any suspicious activity on social media, email or OpenSea, you can report it on our
security.description9: via the #reporting-scams channel. You can also reach us by email at contact@sandbox.game
security.text4: How do I know which assets are safe to buy on OpenSea?
security.description10: When looking for Alpha Passes, Assets, or LANDS on OpenSea, make sure they belong to our verified Sandbox collection by going to
security.text5: What are the official links so I make sure I don’t get scammed?

roadmap.description1: Yes, there will be more seasons after the Alpha ends. The date of the next season is yet to be defined.

create.text1: When a creator designs an asset, they have to distribute points amongst the chosen attributes.
create.text2: A creator can change the amount of attributes while creating an asset.
create.text3: When a Game Maker update is released, new mechanics can use existing attributes or new ones released with the update.

values.1: Attributes give bonuses within a game
values.2: Not having an attribute does not prevent from playing
values.3: Games display used attributes in their description

values.1: Game mechanics come with attribute presets
values.2: Assets need the required attributes to be used with a game mechanism
values.3: Creators can modify the attributes required by a game mechanic

create.text4: This system remains flexible both for creators (allows them to tweak their game at will) and for players (not restricting game access, but giving more or less bonuses).

header.title: VoxEdit - NFT Creator
header.description: The leading software that allows you to create, rig, and animate your own voxel-based NFTs. Sell them on The Sandbox's marketplace and discover a new world.

cards.1: In order to upload your models, you need to become an artist through our Creator Fund.
cards.2: VoxEdit is the only software capable of exporting assets to our Marketplace. Download VoxEdit and start creating.
cards.3: Once you’ve finished your model you can export it to the Marketplace following these simple steps.

1.title: Modeler
1.description: Make the most of your creativity! From beginners to experts, anyone can make amazing creations thanks to our robust set of tools and our user-friendly interface.

2.title: Animator
2.description: A game changer in the voxel creation world. With our Skeleton System, VoxEdit allows you to rig and animate anything that you want using the timeline via an easy-to-use keyframing mode.

3.title: NFT Maker
3.description: Sell, trade, and buy VoxEdit assets on The Sandbox's marketplace and monetize your creations. 95% of all transactions go to you, the creator!

0.text: VoxEdit has impressed me, since it's the fusion of a modeling editor with an animation system all in the same software.
0.author: William Santacruz

1.text: VoxEdit is a game changer for voxel artists looking to animate, being the only dedicated voxel editor that features skeletal rigging and timeline animation.
1.author: Alex Florez

2.text: One of the easiest tools to create animations in voxel art, with an attractive and a very simple easy-to-use interface for beginners.
2.author: Nicolas Morrone

play.title: Play by the Rules!
play.text1: The default size is 32x32x32, which translates to 1 meter (3.2 ft) in The Sandbox Universe.
play.text2: 32x32x32 is the maximum detail available to make inside a cubic meter. An avatar will be about 2 blocks in height (64 Voxels).
play.text3: VoxEdit comes with a lot of templates to help you get started with your creations, however, please take a look at our technical guidelines to make sure your assets will work in the best way in the Game maker.

sandbox.title: What is "The Sandbox" (SAND)
sandbox.text1: The Sandbox is a virtual metaverse where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain using the platform’s utility token SAND. Players can create digital assets in the form of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), upload them to the marketplace, and integrate them into games with Game Maker.
sandbox.text2: A LAND is a digital piece of real estate in The Sandbox metaverse that players can buy to build experiences on. Once a player owns a piece of LAND, they will be able to populate it with games and ASSETS. Multiple LANDS can be combined to form an ESTATE.
sandbox.text3: A total of 166,464 LANDS will be available, contained in a map that will form The Sandbox metaverse.
sandbox.text4: GEMS and CATALYSTS define the tier, scarcity, and attributes of ASSETS. CATALYSTS add empty sockets to the NFTs that can be filled with GEMS. The higher the quality of the CATALYST, the more sockets your ASSET will have.
sandbox.text5: Users can monetize their time on the platform, by keeping 95% of the SAND revenue by:

1.title: Selling ASSETS
1.description: Users can create and sell ASSETS on the marketplace as NFTs.

2.title: Owning a LAND
2.description: Buying a LAND in one of the LAND sales. Players can then rent them or populate them with content to increase the LAND's value.

3.title: Building Games on the Game Maker
3.description: Build and monetize games using the Game Maker on the LANDS that are owned by players.

sandbox.text6: Through the use of ERC-1776, The Sandbox allows platform users to initiate transactions on the Ethereum blockchain while transaction gas fees are paid by the platform, optimizing overall user experience.
sandbox.text7: 50% of all SAND transactions collected from LAND sales, Premium NFT sales, transaction fees and subscription services goes to the Foundation
sandbox.text8: The Foundation supports the ecosystem of The Sandbox, contributing to the growth of awareness about NFTs, the Metaverse, and $SAND.
sandbox.text9: The Foundation is currently involved with

foundation.1: Managing the Game Makers Fund and Creators Fund, offering grants to incentivize high quality content and game production in The Sandbox.
foundation.2: Funding over 17 game projects, some of which have been unveiled to the public at https://www.sandbox.game/game/top
foundation.3: Distributing grants to 100 artists to produce NFTs, most of which can be seen at http://www.sandbox.game/shop
foundation.4: Supporting local community managers to grow awareness around the globe about The Sandbox, NFTs and blockchain gaming via our Community Rewards and Ambassadors program https://medium.com/sandbox-game/the-sandbox-ambassador-program-4f00bb5c9c24
foundation.5: Sponsoring prizes for the various contests organized by The Sandbox team (VoxEdit Contests and Game Jams) to stimulate the creativity of users around the world and get them to engage with the tools of our platform.
foundation.6: Supporting play-to-earn tournaments and cross-gaming with activities that encourage the broader adoption of SAND.

section1.title: Build, own and control your gaming destiny

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox is your chance to create a piece of gaming history. Join our extraordinary metaverse; own and monetize everything you build.
paragraphs.2: Our platform is based on the Ethereum blockchain and uses SAND as its primary utility token. You can use it to buy LAND, create digital assets, and upload them to trade in the marketplace. Or use your assets to create gaming experiences in The Sandbox Game Maker. It’s easy to do, and you don’t need coding experience.
paragraphs.3: When other players buy your assets or play your games, you earn SAND in return. It’s a brilliant, decentralized economy that rewards your participation.
paragraphs.4: If building and monetizing content is not your thing, you can explore the vast virtual world and see how others have developed their LAND. It’s engaging, fun, and ever-changing as our growing community continues to add exciting new characters, landscapes, and games.

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox metaverse is split into 166,464 LANDS, creative sandbox areas owned by you, the players. You can create and monetize online games on your land or rent it to someone else to publish their own creation. Each piece of LAND has a pre-defined default terrain, but you can modify this as you build your own content.

section3.title: User-generated content economy
paragraphs: Three pillars of technology work together to support your user-generated content production (UGC). You own the copyrights of everything you create in The Sandbox, and that will always be provable beyond doubt thanks to the blockchain and smart contracts. The three integrated UGC products that you can access are:
list: Voxel editor to create, rig and animate voxel models fast
Marketplace to view or trade assets to use on your LAND
Game Maker to build, share and monetize your online games

section4.title: Join big-name gaming partners
paragraphs: The Sandbox has already forged more than 50 partnerships with leading brands to develop crypto game content, including Shaun the Sheep, ATARI, and Square Enix, to name but a few. You will see these partners on the game map (see the main menu), alongside thousands of individual users planning their own content. There is plenty of real estate for newcomers.

playToEarn.content: Free-to-play is so 2010… With The Sandbox, you will be able to monetize the games you create! Play-to-Earn is unlocked through our rewarding model for players and creators, who will have strong incentives to play and create with rewards that have real-world value.

zero.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual Metaverse where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences.. You can also invest your crypto currency and earn more SAND

first.title: DISCOVER THE SANDBOX
first.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual Metaverse where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. We empower artists, creators, and players to build the platform they’ve always envisioned, providing them with the means to unleash their creativity.

second.title: BECOME A LAND OWNER
second.paragraph1: A LAND is a piece of The Sandbox metaverse, providing access to exclusive content as well as granting the possibility to monetize your own part of The Sandbox’s Metaverse. Build experiences, host events, invite friends.

third.title: WHY SAND?
third.paragraph1: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

fourth.title: NFT
fourth.paragraph1: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable — allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

privacyPolicy.title: Bacasable Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.text1: GDPR – Privacy-By-Design and Record of Processing Activities
privacyPolicy.text2: We are committed to a lawful, fair and transparent processing of personal data, adhering to the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This privacy policy documents our general privacy-by-design considerations (articles 5, 25 and 26 GDPR) and records our processing activities (article 30(1) GDPR). This privacy policy describes the type of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the website
privacyPolicy.text3: , all platforms and services offered thereon, and through our mobile applications (collectively, our “Website”) and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
privacyPolicy.text4: Company name: BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text5: *Not formally a DPO under the GDPR. Note that the below uses “you” and “us” in the NRS of the paragraphs. 1 to 11 to allow inclusion without modification in our information notices provided to data subjects.
privacyPolicy.text6: Our Website is not intended for children under 18 years of age. No one under age 18 may provide any personal information to or on the Website. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are under 18, do not use or provide any information on this Website or on or through any of its features/register on the Website, make any purchases through the Website, use any of the interactive or public comment features of this Website or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, email address, or any screen name or user name you may use. If we find out we have collected or received personal information from a child under 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 18, please contact us at privacy@sandbox.game.
privacyPolicy.text7: 1. We process the following (categories of) personal data when you play our games, interact with or participate in our gaming platforms, connect to a social networking site through our games, register an account, enter a promo code, or place an order:
privacyPolicy.text8: Your IP address, your SIM code, and the country where you are located. Your device type (for example, PC or Mac, iPhone 7, Samsung Galaxy S7) and operating system version.
privacyPolicy.text9: For analytics, when you installed and played the game, your progress throughout the game, and events that are connected to your game-play. We generally cannot identify you with this data, but treat it the same way as personal data.
privacyPolicy.text10: 2. What (purposes) do we use the data for? We use this personal data to perform analytics for our games and to allow third-parties to sell, buy and deliver advertising in these games. We use your IP address and SIM code to comply with legal obligations, specifically to comply with VAT reporting obligations
privacyPolicy.text11: We use social network data to show you personalized content and synchronize your online progression across multiple devices. For example, we might show a list with only your friends in it, or show your name or avatar on an in-game object.
privacyPolicy.text12: We use your email address that you provided when you signed up for our newsletter to send you the newsletter
privacyPolicy.text13: 3. What is our legal basis for the processing? For both analytics and advertising, we base the processing of personal data on the legitimate interest of TSBMV GLOBAL LTD. For analytics, this is our ability to analyze how players progress through our games to make them better, and to know our player base on an aggregate level. For advertising, this is our ability to be able to off-set development costs and risk with advertising income. We also process your personal data for the legitimate business interest of complying with a legal obligation — we are subject to certain legal requirements which may require us to process your personal data. We may also be obliged by law to disclose your personal data to a regulatory body or law enforcement agency. For the third-parties we use, their legitimate interest is to be able to offer us their services, and for advertising third-parties and advertisers to be able to show you advertising.
privacyPolicy.text14: 4. Where do we obtain the data from (sources)? We obtain data from you (when you provide it directly through the Website) and from our third-party services providers:
privacyPolicy.text19: 5. For how long and where do we store data? We store the personal data that we collect for up to 5 years, and only aggregate data after that time. Aggregation data means that we can no longer look at data for individual players. We store the data with our third-party service provider, Amazon AWS. When a third-party service provider is a controller, they may keep data as well, either for a shorter or longer period.
privacyPolicy.text20: 6. What safeguards have we taken to protect data? Taking into account the nature, scope, context and purpose of the processing, we have taken the following technical and organizational measures:
privacyPolicy.text21: Access to our database and user accounts by third-party service providers is protected with access control.
privacyPolicy.text22: Access to the database is limited, not all staff in our organization have full access.
privacyPolicy.text23: Data sent from our games is encrypted in transit where technically possible. We do not actively monitor the security of our databases and need to rely on our processors to notify us of any data breaches.
privacyPolicy.text24: 7. Who do we share data with? We may disclose aggregated data and any information that does not identify an individual without restriction.
privacyPolicy.text25: We may also disclose personal information that we collect or you provide:
privacyPolicy.text27: To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business.
privacyPolicy.text28: To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, reorganization, dissolution, or other transfer or sale of some or all of TSBMV Global Ltd.’s assets.
privacyPolicy.text29: To fulfill the purposes for which you provide it.
privacyPolicy.text30: For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
privacyPolicy.text32: We share data with the following third-parties. These are either controllers, or processors acting on our behalf. We have linked to their respective policies and given a basic description of what they do:
privacyPolicy.text33: We may also disclose your personal information:
privacyPolicy.text34: To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
privacyPolicy.text35: To enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
privacyPolicy.text36: If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety or TSBMV Global Ltd., our end users, or others.
privacyPolicy.text37: 8. Transfer of your personal data You should also know that your personal data may be transferred from your home country to third parties. If you are an EU resident, this could imply that we also transfer data to countries that do not offer an adequate level of protection for your personal data. When we transfer this data, we will do so only when we have put in place appropriate safeguards to protect your personal data. Please contact us to get a copy of the safeguards that we have put in place. Our contact details are at the end of this privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.text38: 9. Your Rights You have the right to request access to your personal data that we process. You also have the right to:
privacyPolicy.text39: Rectify incorrect personal data or erase it in certain circumstances.
privacyPolicy.text40: Restrict or object to the processing of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.text41: Receive your data so that you can use it elsewhere (data portability).
privacyPolicy.text42: If you wish to exercise any of the above rights, please send us an email at privacy@sandbox.game. You may also update your personal data in your profile on The Sandbox via the settings. Finally, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. If you do not know who your supervisory authority is, please contact us and we will tell you.
privacyPolicy.text43: 10. How to contact us You can contact us with any questions you may have about the processing of your personal data or the use of cookies and similar technologies by us, or to exercise the above rights: Web: http://www.sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text44: Address: Company name: BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text45: 11. Version information: We last updated this notice on August 28, 2020. You can view it at

topInfos.title: The Sandbox
topInfos.paragraph: The Sandbox is a virtual metaverse where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences and assets inside an immense virtual world. The Sandbox offers a suite of tools, tailor-made to empower players to come together and create engaging experiences across the metaverse.

intro.title: The Sandbox is very happy to release its first closed Alpha!
intro.description: Please remember the ecosystem is still a work in progress so you might still find some fresh paint and bugs. Our main goals are to test the infrastructure of our servers, social management and user flow. Please help us improve the experience by providing feedback on our website in the Alpha section.

rewards.paragraph: How does it work, what can you do and what do you earn? We tell you everything!

reward.title: Reward
reward.subtitle: +1,000 Sand
reward.paragraph1: The total prize pool is 1M SAND!
reward.paragraph2: Each player can win up to 1,000 SAND. Which means there will be 1,000 winners!

explore.title: Explore our best levels
explore.subtitle: Everything you can see in the game can be purchased in the marketplace.

hub.paragraph: The Sandbox Hub is the central place of the Metaverse. Here you will find a Gallery where many NTFs are exhibited, access portals to other experiences, a concert space as well as three areas inhabited by our factions: Oracles, Heroes and Scientists.

glitches.title: Glitches in the Metaverse
glitches.paragraph1: We don’t know yet what causes this, but you’ll frequently find Metaglitches, those little bits of other places of the Metaverse that spawn where they shouldn’t.
glitches.paragraph2: This is the opportunity to meet people and see NFTs that we don’t often meet!

1.title: How many Avatars are there?
1.paragraph: There are 10,000 unique Snoop Avatars, programmatically generated from over 150 hand-crafted traits.

2.title: What can I do with the Avatars?
2.paragraph: Each avatar will unlock unique utility that goes beyond a simple NFT. They will be playable in The Sandbox, and can be used to unlock future mints, and features in the metaverse. In addition, they will be part of the first ever Snoop Dogg music video, happening in The Sandbox.

3.title: How do I get whitelisted?
3.paragraph: Follow us on @TheSnoopAvatars on Twitter to find out how to get whitelisted and get your hands on an avatar before everyone else.

4.title: How do I know if I’m whitelisted?
4.paragraph: Winners will be informed through our social channels and/or Discords. Keep an eye out for more info.
